verbs.description: [ARG0: south carolina island] [V: considers] [ARG1: banning chain businesses a beach town in south carolina] is considering an ordinance to prevent chain restaurants and stores from opening on the island folly beach is considering an ordinance to prevent any company with 10 or more locations with the same names branding and products from locating in the town the post and courier of charleston reported administrator south carolina island sullivans island the post tim goodwin folly beach south carolina south carolina lauren gellaty starbucks sullivan island s c charleston folly beach aaron pope
